title: Avatar: Fire and Ash
description: James Cameron's next chapter in the Avatar saga. The Na'vi face new threats as the RDA returns with devastating force.
descriptions: James Cameron's next chapter in the Avatar saga. The Na'vi face new threats as the RDA returns with devastating force.
The third installment of James Cameron's Avatar franchise, exploring the 'Ash People' of Pandora.
War between the Na'vi and the RDA intensifies as a new fire-based tribe emerges on the moons of Pandora.

title: The Batman Part II
description: The sequel to Matt Reeves' The Batman, continuing the crime saga in Gotham City.
descriptions: The sequel to Matt Reeves' The Batman, continuing the crime saga in Gotham City.
Robert Pattinson returns as the Dark Knight in the second chapter of Matt Reeves' epic crime saga.
Gotham City is once again under threat as Batman faces new challenges in this highly anticipated sequel.
